acqinfo.p: The Papers of Albemarle Confederate Memorial Association were given to the Library by Mrs. Edward Younger of Crozet, Virginia on October 20, 1981.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of thirty-three items, 1933-1943, chiefly correspondence, financial records, two bank books, and a ledger of the Albemarle Confederate Memorial Association of the United Daughters of the Confederacy, Charlottesville, Virginia. The correspondence discusses the maintenance of the Confederate Cemetary, the construction of a wall separating it from the University of Virginia Cemetary, and the Association's expenditures for the cemetary. The financial records include receipts, cancelled checks, and bank statements.
